subs.text: @KayYash6 @1sweetlyfierce1 @allbusch @Angry_Staffer Pretty much. 10 CFR includes most energy-related regulations, except for conservation (18 CFR) and mining (30 CFR). - - - CFR: Title 10. Energy: [link]
subs.rawText:
@KayYash6 @1sweetlyfierce1 @allbusch @Angry_Staffer Pretty much.

10 CFR includes most energy-related regulations, except for conservation (18 CFR) and mining (30 CFR).

     - - -
